page.title: 12HOUSE OF DESPINA
page.content: This business is named after the managers wife,Despina and has now been going for over eight years.They manufacture all sorts of toiletries. Handcreams,lotions and soaps are just a few of them.They buy porcelain containers which they then fill. The manager doesn't sell his products in the House Of Despina or straight to the shops but to the wholesalers. They have a childrens section called Bianca.This is named after the managers child.Quite a lot of new mixed scents (several flowers and herbs)are named after the managers family. The manager specializes in herbs and dried flowers which are imported separately from countries all over the world e.g.Africa,Egypt,China etc. He then mixes the pot pourris himself and names them.These are then exported to over 56 countries.
